mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM tblBoardLike WHERE boardSeq = #{boardSeq} AND id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tblBoardLike WHERE boardSeq = #{boardSeq} AND id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tblBoardLike (boardLikeSeq, boardSeq, id) VALUES ((SELECT max(boardLikeSeq) FROM tblBoardLike) + 1, #{boardSeq}, #{id})
